name: Re-Pear (Skyler Zartman, Caden Messenger)
description: In a world where there exists a farmer that hates pears, you must rise up against the tyranny and take back what is yours. In this game your main goal is to grow your hoard of pears by re-pearing fallen brethren, taking down evil creatures, and lastly taking on the pear hating mongerer himself. To play the game, use WASD to control the pear, hold left mouse click to launch pears, and press space to hop
